choices: Head to the nearest town to gather information from the locals
1.content:
Name:Kayo "Blues" Aemskey

Weapons:Pistol(x)4,shotgun,Minigun(x)2,Missile Launcher,Jello Nades,Grenades,Flash Nades.

Appearance:Long sleeved black shirt,baggy black pants and a black cloak with a slit of the entire right side.Messy black hair that gradually becomes silver as it grows out.



You stare down at the horizon from your viewpoint at the top of this chilly mountain.You think to yourself where Gale could've possibly gone for the past months.Memories of the several bar fights and dead beat muggings he put you through.

"Fine by me...Time to go search around a bit...."you say,jumping down the mountain arrogantly.
1.title: Kayo's Begining

choices: Try to find out where he goes next
13.content:
Name: Austin "Flames" James

Weapons: shotgun(x2), missile launcher(x2)

Appearance: Afro haircut with yellow and orange highlights, black tee and jeans with a flame motif down the side of the shirt and continuing onto the jeans.

You reach the top of the mountain, following Blues closely but surreptitiously. You don't want him to know you're following him. When he jumps down the mountain, you weigh your options. He could be one of the bad guys, or was that rumor false?

What do you do then?
13.title: Choose Another Character:Pyro

info.brief_description: A few my friends figured we should make an easy story about our chars.
info.description: A story about my friends and my RP chars.We all decided this would be a cool time killer.There are multiple storylines and a fight at the end of each story.Much more difficult than it sounds...
info.pretty_title: A Day in the Life of a Jackass
